fields.name: Siren - Nitro Pompelmocello Juicy Grapefruit IPA 6.0%
fields.description:
This IPA is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Siren. 

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 6.0% ABV. 

The Brewery says: A playful and unique creation, as our ever-popular Pompelmocello gets the nitro treatment for the first time. This hop-forward, sour grapefruit IPA picks up plenty of smoothness and body, making it even more crushable than before with sorbet-like refreshment.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Fantasma Gluten Free IPA 6.5%
fields.description: What’s that? Gluten-free, you say? Magic Rock have brought every beer-loving celiac’s dream to life with this here corker of an IPA. Hazy, dank and tropically fruity with a restrained bitterness and great drinkability.

fields.name: Buxton - Axe Edge IPA 6.8%
fields.description: A full-flavoured IPA. Light amber with flavours of mandarin orange, tropical fruits and a warming, dry finish. Buxton have dedicated themselves to creating some of the best beers in Europe and this is one of the beers that is definitely helping them achieve their goal.

fields.name: Gipsy Hill - Hepcat Session IPA 4.6%
fields.description: Unashamedly fruity thanks to its star-studded line-up of hoppy personalities, this gloriously drinkable session IPA packs Mosaic , Citra, Equinox and Motueka – a veritable fantastic four of the hop world. Eye-catchingly orange and bursting with tropical-citrus flavour this Hepcat is a beatnik brew fit for the masses.

fields.name: CR/AK - Mundaka Session IPA 4.6%
fields.description: Mundaka is a very hoppy Session IPA that’s super drinkable, with a nice dry finish and light bitterness. Simcoe and Citra hops cause a wave of aromas that tease our tastebuds with mandarin, mango, pineapple and cedar, before a light malted base kicks in.

fields.name: Siren - DDH Pompelmocello Grapefruit Sour IPA 7.4%
fields.description: The Brewery says: An exclusive double dry hopped version of Pompelmocello. This beer is brimming with Simcoe and Talus, our favourite hops for driving pithy grapefruit notes. Grapefruit zest and juice accentuate the hoppy aromas, while a sensation of vibrant sourness, inherent sweetness and subtle bitterness all combine for a taste sensation.

fields.name: Siren - Soundwave IPA 5.6%
fields.description: The driest of Siren’s regulars, Soundwave smacks you about with intense grapefruit, peach and mango hop flavours before leading into a lengthy, dry and resinous finish. The kind of beer you’d wanna suck down while chowing on a tasty salt beef sandwich or a citrusy stir-fry

fields.name: The Beak Brewery - Fluff NE IPA 6.5%
fields.description:
This IPA is lovingly brewed by the fantastic The Beak Brewery.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 6.5% ABV.

fields.name: Gipsy Hill x HonestBrew - Hip Sip Hooray NE SIPA 4.8%
fields.description: Brewed in collaboration with Gipsy Hill for our 8th birthday, Hip Sip Hooray is a New England Session IPA that’s bursting with tropical vibes. The style, hop bill and name were voted for by our members, and they chose wisely, with the medley of Sabro, Azacca and Meridian hops combining for a session-worthy beer that’s big on flavour. Expect lashings of fruity notes, a blast of coconut and minimal bitterness as this one goes down an absolute treat

fields.name: Verdant - Don't Tell Gus DIPA 8%
fields.description: Don’t Tell Gus is a Double IPA hopped with a hush combo of Centennial, Bravo, Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe and Cascade. The brew’s texture is made fuller with additions of Extra Pale Ale, Golden Promise, Wheat, Oats and Flaked Wheat. Shhh. Keep your love for this 8% brew to yourself.

fields.name: The Garden Brewery - New England Pale Ale 5 4.7%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic The Garden Brewery.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.7% ABV.

The Brewery says: Peach, Mandarin and Coconut aromas. Packed with Sabro, Simcoe and HBC 431 hops

fields.name: Big Drop - Paradiso Alcohol Free Citra IPA 0.5%
fields.description: Big Drop aren’t afraid to bring out the big guns in pursuit of hoppier, craftier alcohol free beer. A dash of Citra hops to this boozeless brew lends a lush hop-driven, citrus, lime and grapefruit aroma that brings to mind much bigger beers.

fields.name: Track - Invisible Frequencies Pale Ale 4.8%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Track.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.8% ABV.

The Brewery says: A beautiful hazy Pale Ale laced with Citra & Idaho 7. Big hits of tropical fruits and lychee and seriously drinkable! A+ On the Pale Ale scale

fields.name: Big Drop - Alcohol Free Pale Ale 0.5%
fields.description: This boozeless brew is made in the style of a superbly drinkable pale ale, dry hopped to provide a sweet, piney aroma to add extra enjoyment.

fields.name: Basqueland - Aupa Pale Ale 5.3%
fields.description: Healthy doses of Centennial hops, a palatable blonde body flooded with hints of tangerine and jasmine tea, and a whole lotta Basqueland passion combine to create this California-style Pale Ale. Journey to the vivid landscape of the Basque Country with every single sip.

fields.name: Roosters - Baby Face Assasin IPA 6.1%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Roosters.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 6.1% ABV.

The Brewery says: Baby-Faced Assassin was conceived as a homebrew recipe in the back office of Beer Ritz in Headingley, Leeds, on a dark winter’s afternoon in early 2011.”

fields.name: Camden Town - Pale Ale 4%
fields.description: Gotta be one of the quintessential examples of a session Pale Ale influenced by folks across the pond. Deliciously fruity with a crisp, inviting bitterness.

fields.name: Brew by Numbers - 42 DDH Pale Morden Wharf 5.5%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Brew by Numbers.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 5.5% ABV.

fields.name: Adnams - Ghost Ship Pale Ale 4.5%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Adnams.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.5% ABV.

fields.name: Polly's Brew Co - Exp. 630 DDH Pale Ale 5.5%
fields.description:
This Pale Ale is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Polly’s Brew Co.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 5.5% ABV.

fields.name: Siren - Santo Dry Hopped Lager 5%
fields.description: Santo is a distinctly Siren lager. Their take on the style is full of American hops, working in harmony to offer subtle tropical fruit notes and bright citrus flavours. It pours with a delicate haze and a striking aroma. Saintly fresh, but devilishly drinkable.

fields.name: Boundary - Dispiriting Exercise Czech Pils Lager 5.0%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Boundary.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 5.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Saaz and Tettnang combine to produce a spicy and aromatic yet drinkable pilsner in the traditional Bohemian style

fields.name: Galway Bay - My Bamberg Hells Smoked Lager 4.5%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Galway Bay.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: MY BAMBERG HELL is a simple Helles style lager with a little nuance. German Pilsner malt, decoction mashed, & fermented long & cool with a big cone of yeast from our fermenting smoked Märzen beer. This gives this lager a subtle smokey note which compliments the delicate Mittlefrüh hops beautifully.

fields.name: Signature Brew - Studio Lager 4%
fields.description: Based on one of the most traditional styles of beer in the world, Studio Pilsner is an homage to time and refinement. The highest quality European ingredients combined with impeccable patience result in the perfect, light lager. Noble hop Saaz and a touch of rye work in tandem to provide enticing subtle flavours and a well rounded body, the aroma holds floral hints followed by a pleasing bitterness.

fields.name: Big Drop - Alcohol Free Lager 0.5%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Big Drop

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml bottle and is 0.5% ABV.

The good people at Big Drop say:
Super crisp, alcohol-free pilsner with zero sugar.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Magic Lager No Tricks 4.5%
fields.description: Magic Rock’s first take on this beer style. Lager, Munich and Cara malts create the pale colour and classic backbone, while a concoction of Germany’s finest Strisselspalt, Herrsbrucker and Hallertau hops deliver bitterness and herbal hit. A lightness of body and spritzy carbonation makes the beer dance on your palate while a big whack of aromatic dry hopping gives this Bavarian bear its claws…. PROST!

fields.name: Boundary - Simplicated Czech Pilsner 5.5%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Boundary.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 5.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: A crisp, refreshing Pils generously hopped with Saaz.

fields.name: BrewDog - Lost Lager 4.5%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic BrewDog.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 4.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: Our new recipe Lost. This planet first German-style Pilsner is a 4.5% lager brewed using wind power, a third less water, and would-be waste bread in the malt bill. The addition of Select, Spalter and Saphir hops combine vibrant citrus and herbal notes for an iconic lager tase that’s both crisp and refreshing.

fields.name: Motel Brewery - Reinickendorf Kellerbier 4.8%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Motel Brewery.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 4.8% ABV.

It’s the perfect marriage of Bamberg malt, Tettnanger hops and Bavarian yeast. Flavours and aromas of bready malt and spicy lemony hops.

fields.name: Adnams - Kobold Lager 4.7%
fields.description:
This Lager is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Adnams.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.7% ABV.

The Brewery says: This crisp 4.7% ABV lager is created with all English ingredients and is perfect for all occasions. Using East Anglian extra pale malted barley and wheat, with Goldings hops from Hertfordshire and Kent. Kobold Lager is a crisp, clean, classic style. Light bready, honeyed aroma with subtle grassy and lemon notes.

fields.name: Siren - Broken Dream Breakfast Stout 6.5%
fields.description: Siren’s Breakfast Stout packs an expertly brewed smooth combo of coffee and chocolate you’d be forgiven for thinking you were drinking a mocha with your corn flakes. Its silky, medium body brings dried fruits and a little licorice, finishing with a light, coffee/caramel bitterness.

fields.name: Buxton - Barrel Masters 2020 Petrosian Stout BA Bourbon 16.5%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Buxton.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 16.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: Tigran Vartanovič Petrosjan was a Soviet chess player of Armenian origin, world champion from 1963 to 1969.

Characterized by an unspectacular but technically flawless style of play, he remained famous for his virtually impenetrable defensive tactics, which have pushed his name to the top of the rankings of the most difficult chess players of all time.

One of the beers of Buxton’s Barrel Masters 2020 project is dedicated to him, focusing on the figures of world-famous chess players.

fields.name: Buxton - Barrel Masters 2020 Lasker Stout BA Bourbon 16.7%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Buxton.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 16.7% ABV.

The Brewery says: A huge, full bodied stout with notes of dark chocolate and forest fruits. Slightly sweet with toffee, caramel, vanilla and oak on the nose and the palate. Bourbon Barrel Aged Imperial Stout.

fields.name: Buxton - Single Barrel Rainshadow 2020 12.0%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Buxton.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 12.0% ABV.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Dark Arts Stout 6%
fields.description: Traditionally, the dark arts are practiced with the intent of inflicting pain, suffering and all manner of ghastly misfortunes upon a victim. Magic Rock’s Dark Arts Stout may well hail from the dark side, but grasping a can of the supernatural brew in your hand couldn’t be more enjoyable. Blending four malts to produce a decadent and indulgent elixir compounded by its luxurious mouthfeel, this spicy stout bubbles with smooth chocolate and zingy berry flavours before disappearing down your gullet with a lingering roasted bitterness.

fields.name: Siren - Mucha Mocha Imperial Coffee Stout 10.0%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Siren.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 10.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Mucha Mocha is the big one – all the barrel aged coffee, chocolate and roasty goodness you could ask for.

fields.name: Gipsy Hill - Glimmer Tropical Stout 4.5%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Gipsy Hill.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: A mesmerising mix of sabro and tonka beans to create an indulgent but low abv stout for the Autumn

fields.name: Wiper and True - Milk Shake Stout 5.6%
fields.description: Copious chocolate malts laced with vanilla to create a luxurious, milkshake-rich dark beer.

fields.name: Buxton - Nargil Coconut Pastry Stout 6.0%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Buxton.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 6.0% ABV.

A richly flavoured stout exhibiting smooth texture and mouthfeel. Made with bountiful additions of coconut in the fermenter.

fields.name: Big Drop - Alcohol Free Stout 0.5%
fields.description:
This Stout is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Big Drop.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 0.5% ABV.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Salty Kiss Gooseberry Gose 4.1%
fields.description: Magic Rock’s take on the Leipziger Gose, brewed initially as a collab with Danish master brewer Anders Kissmeyer. Gooseberries, Sea-Buckthorn and Sea Salt are tossed into the mix adding some fine complexity to this lightly tart, refreshing Gose.

fields.name: Siren - Calypso Berliner Weisse 4%
fields.description: Calypso was the goddess known for her sharp tongue. This beer is their homage to this enchantress, a tart, spritzy Berliner style sour beer that is liberally dry hopped with a different single hop for each batch. To know which hop you are drinking, check out their website and match the batch number to the hop.

fields.name: BRLO - Goosebumps Gooseberry Berliner Weisse 4.0%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic BRLO.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 4.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Dryhopped Berliner Weisse with Gooseberries

fields.name: Tanker - Pinco Non Alcoholic Pineapple Sour 0.0%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Tanker.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 0.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Non-Alcoholic Beer

PINCO
Pineapple & Coconut
Alcohol free berliner weisse
Limited Summer Edition

fields.name: Brew by Numbers - 19 Gose Plum & Raspberry & Passionfruit 6.5%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Brew by Numbers.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 6.5% ABV.

fields.name: Puhaste x Arpus - Captured Sunlight Imperial Quince Gose 7.0%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Puhaste.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 7.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Imperial Gose with quince. Collaboration with Arpus.

fields.name: Stu Mostow x North - ART +45 Triple Fruited Gose Banana & Strawberry 4.5%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Stu Mostow.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.5% ABV.

The Brewery says: Sweet and salty, gently sour and incredibly delicious beer combination! Into our new Gose from ART+ brand we added huge amounts of bananas and strawberries, which resulted in an extremely full, well-balanced taste and intense fruit aroma. Don`t forget to try this one out!

fields.name: Pomona Island - Stacks Of Green Paper Strawberry & Raspberry Sour 6.5%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Pomona Island.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 6.5% ABV.

fields.name: Overtone - Mellow Sun Imperial Tropical Sour 8.0%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Overtone.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 8.0% ABV.

The Brewery says: Welcome to sunshine in a can. With tartness from the golden berries, citrus from the tangerines and the sweetness from the pineapples, this fruit combination provides the perfect sweet-sour ratio. Don’t be fooled, we promise this is beer.

Hops: Callista, Aurora
Adjuncts: Golden Berry, Tangerine, Pineapple

fields.name: Tanker - Freedom To Roam Kveik Blueberry Sour 4.4%
fields.description:
This Sour Beer is lovingly brewed by the fantastic Tanker.

This tasty brew comes in a 440ml can and is 4.4% ABV.

The Brewery says: Fermentation is the path to the sour side… bacteria lead to fermentation, fermentation leads to acidity, acidity leads to mouth-puckering.

An almost criminally smooth sour ale brewed with fluffy wheat and oats and fermented with kveik yeast and blueberries. Peace!”

fields.name: Siren - Calypso Berliner Weisse 4.0% - 4 Pack 4.0%
fields.description: Calypso was the goddess known for her sharp tongue. This beer is their homage to this enchantress, a tart, spritzy Berliner style sour beer that is liberally dry hopped with a different single hop for each batch. To know which hop you are drinking, check out their website and match the batch number to the hop.

fields.name: BrewDog - Punk AF Alcohol Free - 4 Pack 0.5%
fields.description:
This IPA is lovingly brewed by the fantastic BrewDog.

This tasty brew comes in a 330ml can and is 0.5% ABV.

fields.name: Buxton - Myrcia Session IPA - 4 Pack 4.0%
fields.description: A 4 pack of Buxton’s Myrcia Session IPA. Hopburst – Additions of only aroma hops in the whirlpool and dry hopping in the fermenters.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Salty Kiss Gooseberry Gose 4.1% - 4 Pack 4.1%
fields.description: Magic Rock’s take on the Leipziger Gose, a sour refreshing beer with a hint of saltiness from the natural water sources, was brewed initially as a collab with Danish master brewer Anders Kissmeyer. Gooseberries, Sea-Buckthorn and Sea Salt are tossed into the mix adding some fine complexity to this lightly tart, refreshing Gose.

fields.name: Signature Brew - Backstage IPA - 4 Pack 5.6%
fields.description: Backstages across the land are a barren wasteland for quality beer, artists are rewarded for their creative efforts with a warm can of something bland. They should however be a place of celebration and accomplishment, a job well done rewarded with the best that can be offered, in that spirit we made this beer. A combination of American hops and European malt here give the right blend between refreshment and complexity. After you’ve exited stage left, from whatever it is you may do, you deserve a solid hop hit of Backstage IPA.

fields.name: Magic Rock - Saucery Session IPA - 12 Pack 3.9%
fields.description: A 12 pack of Magic Rock’s Saucery. From the brewery: A supernatural gluten-free session IPA made for drinking all day long. Lightly sweet and malty Golden Promise™ malt, a balanced bitterness and layers of tropical fruit filled Citra and Ekuanot hops in whirlpool and dry hop. Fermented with London Fog Ale yeast to add more fruity body, and enhance malt and hop profile.

fields.name: Siren - Soundwave IPA - 12 Pack 5.6%
fields.description: A 12 pack of Siren’s Soundwave. The driest of Siren’s regulars, Soundwave smacks you about with intense grapefruit, peach and mango hop flavours before leading into a lengthy, dry and resinous finish. The kind of beer you’d wanna suck down while chowing on a tasty salt beef sandwich or a citrusy stir-fry.

fields.name: Signature Brew - Roadie Session IPA - 12 Pack 4.3%
fields.description: A 12 pack of Signature Brew’s Roadie. Winner of SIBA SE’s Gold Award for Best Canned Pale Ale, Roadie is a dependable and refreshing road-dog of a beer. Boasting a hard-earned reputation and fit for grafters and road crews the world over, this all-night IPA loads up notes of citrus fruits including grapefruit and lime. Unsung heroes of venues, bars and festivals: Signature Brew salute you.

fields.name: Beavertown - Neck Oil Session IPA - 12 Pack 4.3%
fields.description: A 12 pack of Beavertown’s Neck Oil. Picture sucking a few of these down in front of the barbecue in a park on a sun-shiny day – that’s this beer’s raison d’etre. Light, crisp and refreshing with punchy notes of citrus peel and light pine, Neck Oil is nicely balanced with slightly sweet biscuity malt throughout, finishing with a medium grapefruit bitterness. And at 4.3%, this is surely one you can sit on all day.

fields.name: Beavertown - Gamma Ray Pale Ale - 12 Pack 5.4%
fields.description: A 12 pack of Beavertown’s Gamma Ray. The concept was to create a juicy tropical beer. A brew you can sit on and drink all day, rammed with juicy malts and huge tropical aromas of mango and grapefruit. Massive additions of whole leaf American hops are added in ever increasing numbers at the end of the boil giving huge hop flavour. The beer is then dry hopped for days, driving the punchy aromas so you can smell it from miles away!

fields.name: 2 Leffe Glasses
fields.description: A classic among the classics, the 25cl Leffe glass is 19.3 cm high and 9 cm in diameter. This glass will allow you further to appreciate the aromas and flavours of your Leffe beers!

fields.name: 2 Teku Saviere Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 Teku glasses of 25cl signed Saveur Biere, ideal for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 Hoegarden Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 Hoegaarden Julius 33cl glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 La Trappe Glasses
fields.description:
A pack of 2 La Trappe glasses of 25cl, ideal for your tastings!

The La Trappe (Trappistenbier) glass has a capacity of 25cl, a height of 16 cm and a diameter of 10 cm. It is a rounded goblet with a golden edge and has a "La Trappe" inscription at the top.

fields.name: 2 Gouden Carolus glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 25cl Gouden Carolus glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2  Oppigårds Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 25cl Oppigårds glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 Põhjala Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 25cl Põhjala glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 Poppels Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 25cl Poppels glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 Tiny Rebel Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 Tiny Rebel 50cl flat bottom glasses, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: 2 Nomade Glasses
fields.description: A pack of 2 Nómada glasses of 30cl, perfect for your tastings!

fields.name: Paulaner Munich Hell Lager 5L Mini Keg
fields.description:
Paulaner Munich Lager 5L Mini Keg 4.9% ABV

Paulaner Munich Lager, Helles, 100% natural. Brewed with pure spring water, Paulaner's centuries-old yeast strain, Hallertau hops, and malted barley Rich, true, all-natural flavours with the traditional light, hoppy finish.

We want you to enjoy every last sip of Paulaner, however, there are a few simple things to be aware of when using mini-kegs. Simply follow the instruction and you’ll end up with the perfect glass full! Contains high-quality beer and requires chilling for a couple of days before opening. Once opened consume within three days. Store in a cool place, between 10C and 12C Lift the top vent and turn it to the left. This reduces the pressure in the keg. Pull out the tap on the handle the full length. For tapping please turn the tap to the left. To close the tap, turn it back to the right.

fields.name: Expired Born Lager 5L Mini Keg BBD
fields.description:
East Anglian extra pale malted barley and wheat, with Goldings, hops from Hertfordshire and Kent. Born Lager is a crisp, clean, classic style. Light bready, honeyed aroma with subtle grassy and lemon notes. Straw, pale golden yellow the colour of sunrise reflected across the sea during the golden hour

Ingredients: Water, Malted Barley, Malted Wheat (contains Gluten), Hops, Yeast

Brewed By Adnams for the Happy Beer Project

fields.name: Whitstable Bay Pale Ale 5L Mini Keg
fields.description:
Whitstable Bay Pale Ale 5L Mini Keg

ABV 4.0% 

Whitstable Bay Pale Ale is designed to suit all palates and offer a light, refreshing taste.

The sweet maltiness balances perfectly with the fresh pine notes provided by the hops added late in the process, to offer a light-coloured, thirst-quenching ale.

fields.name: Happy Birthday Ale 5L Mini Keg
fields.description:
Golden colour Armchair Ale with a blend of American and German hops to give an opulently floral honey-colour ale. Orange blossom and fresh zest are at the forefront with a subtle sweetness behind.

Ingredients: Water, Malted Barley, Malted Wheat (contains Gluten), Hops, Yeast

fields.name: Happy Birthday Porter 5L Mini Keg
fields.description:
Happy Birthday 4.5% Dark Porter By The Happy Beer Project

Our Settee Porter is a rich, velvety dark porter. Subtle smoke, chocolate and iced coffee flavours from roasted malts are topped off with a distinctly vanilla aroma.

Ingredients: Water, Malt and wheat (GLUTEN), hops & yeast

fields.name: Beavertown - Neck Oil - 4 Pack 4.3%
fields.description: A 4 pack of Beavertown’s Neck Oil. Picture sucking a few of these down in front of the barbecue in a park on a sun-shiny day – that’s this beer’s raison d’etre. Light, crisp and refreshing with punchy notes of citrus peel and light pine, Neck Oil is nicely balanced with slightly sweet biscuity malt throughout, finishing with a medium grapefruit bitterness. And at 4.3%, this is surely one you can sit on all day.

fields.name: Beavertown - Gamma Ray - 4 Pack 5.4%
fields.description: A 4 pack of Beavertown’s Gamma Ray. The concept was to create a juicy tropical beer. A brew you can sit on and drink all day, rammed with juicy malts and huge tropical aromas of mango and grapefruit. Massive additions of whole leaf American hops are added in ever increasing numbers at the end of the boil giving huge hop flavour. The beer is then dry hopped for days, driving the punchy aromas so you can smell it from miles away!
